Text:
"http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/5833388/TTC_-_Worlda__s_Greatest_Paintings"

True, but mine are in a different format, have higher standards of ripping, and a full description. Don't get pissy, do a better job.

great course!
anybody got "Great Authors of the Western Literary Tradition, 2nd Edition"?

@rambam1776: man, that's a mean thing to say to dohduhdah... He is our guru on TTC courses. Nobody here is doing a better job than him!

First part of your comment is useful info, and courses with better quality are always welcome.  Last phrase was an unhappy one, on my opinion...

xorXpto writes:

"@rambam1776: man, that's a mean thing to say to dohduhdah... He is our guru on TTC courses. Nobody here is doing a better job than him!

First part of your comment is useful info, and courses with better quality are always welcome. Last phrase was an unhappy one, on my opinion..."

As was his. I upped a fresh rip because I downloaded his originally. As a video course on paintings, visuals were particularly important here, but the quality on the rip was inadequate. So, I quietly offered a better one. Notice that I did NOT go to *HIS* torrent and offer a link, like a jerk. I did NOT write in my description that I had a problem with his. HE came here and got pissy. Since nobody gets paid for all this, or depends on it for a living, or is anyway the original artist, *I* found *THAT* rude.
@rambam1776: I'm just pointing out there is another version available on tpb. I'm not saying you shouldn't upload your version. Any alternative version is always welcome (bigger or smaller).
